title: 157: Kaitlyn Bristowe’s Season Recap w/ Nick Viall
itunes:title: 157: Kaitlyn Bristowe’s Season Recap w/ Nick Viall
description:
The Broads recap “The Bachelor: Greatest of All Time - Kaitlyn Bristowe". First they discuss Matt James being announced as The Bachelor (more to come in next week’s episode) and then they dive into Kaitlyn’s season recap. They chat about ABC’s double Bachelorette to start off the season, Ben’s sex-ed speech, Kaitlyn’s candor, JJ & Clint, and more. They are then joined by Nick Viall to discuss his heartbreaking breakup, his glow up, the “love letters”, his current relationship with Shawn and the other men, and then they spend a while discussing Garret Y, and much more. 
***Join us Thursday when we re-release a podcast episode with Zina about sexual preferences, lube shaming, STD’s, the sex talk with kids, and more! 
NICK VIALL: 
@nickviall
Check out his podcast “The Viall Files” here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-viall-files/id1448210981
THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS: 
*** TALKSPACE: Use promo code CHATTY to get $100 off your first month
